name: Absence of Signal: Loss - DEMO
description:
Absence of Signal: Loss

Demo for NanoReno 2020

This is a WIP demo of a longer Adventure Game / Visual Novel.

Controls: Mouse. Hold down left button and drag to navigate the 360 view. Left Click to continue Dialogues. Right click to activate 'Action Icons' like examine (eye) and travel (boot.)

Portrait Art: Justin Nichols.
